specialRules.hint: The hero and its unit get AP(+1) in melee when charging.

specialRules.hint: This model gets +2 to defense rolls when fighting in melee.

specialRules.description: This model gets +2 to defense rolls when fighting in melee.

specialRules.hint: The hero and its unit count as having the Regeneration rule.

specialRules.description: The hero and its unit count as having the Regeneration rule.

specialRules.description: The hero and its unit get +1 to Regeneration rolls.

specialRules.hint: This model counts as having the Ambush rule, and may be deployed up to 1” away from enemy units.
specialRules.name: Shadow
specialRules.label: Shadow
specialRules.description: This model counts as having the Ambush rule, and may be deployed up to 1” away from enemy units.

specialRules.hint: When in melee, may pick one model from the enemy unit and roll one die. On a 2+ it takes 1 hit with Deadly(3).
specialRules.name: Takedown
specialRules.label: Takedown
specialRules.description: When in melee, may pick one model from the enemy unit and roll one die. On a 2+ it takes 1 hit with Deadly(3).

specialRules.hint: This model moves 12” when using Advance and 24” when using Rush/Charge.
specialRules.name: Very Fast
specialRules.label: Very Fast
specialRules.description: This model moves 12” when using Advance and 24” when using Rush/Charge.

specialRules.hint: This model gets +1 to its attack rolls for melee and shooting.
specialRules.name: Veteran Infantry

specialRules.description: This model gets +1 to its attack rolls for melee and shooting.

specialRules.hint: Once per activation, pick 2 units within 6”, which get Regeneration next time they take wounds.

specialRules.description: Once per activation, pick 2 units within 6”, which get Regeneration next time they take wounds.

spells.name: Anxiety
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -2 to its next morale test.

spells.name: Psych Grave
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 4 automatic hits each.

spells.name: Drugs
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it takes wounds.

spells.name: Pain
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits with AP(1).

spells.name: Adrenaline
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately charge by up to 6” and gets +1 to hit for that melee.

spells.name: Snake Bite
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 3 automatic hits with AP(2).
